name: Jeff Lean
text:
We were extremely disappointed in our experience with Exit Realty and agent Tommy Stanton.  Being a former Realtor myself in Tennessee, I'm aware of the responsibility an agent has to their client.  When we hired Mr. Stanton, we were pleased with his feedback and demeanor.  As time passed the feedback, both from his weekly calls stopping and the review emails from the property viewings, slowed down significantly, however we would still consider it satisfactory.  Throughout listing our property with Mr. Stanton, we provided him with all of the information he requested.  However, 36 hours from closing, we were told that we would have to pay our property pool assessment to the tune of $4700.  It was our understanding this would be assumed by the new buyers.  At first he said that he didn't want to go around and around if we told him or not (which we did upon hiring him), but he was aware of our other assessment, so the logic of knowing one but not the other makes no sense.  As I stated in an email to him, even if we pretend that we didn't pass along the information, he's presented himself as one of the most knowledgable and successful agents in the area with lot of experience at the Gulf Shores Plantation.  How would an expert agent who does business there all the time, not be aware to ask about an assessment that began a year and a half ago, which all units there had.  He then proceeded to tell us that he checked on it and the assessment was non-transferrable and could not be assumed by the buyer, which we double checked with our HOA and that was untrue.  We had to pay it because our agent didn't negotiate that on our behalf in the contract.  We gave him a grace period to do something to make it right and were basically told that it just was what it was.  Instead, Mr. Stanton tried to force the situation/closing like everything was common practice.  Had any effort been shown to correct this or any financial responsibility whatsoever been taken, we absolutely wouldn't have posted reviews on every website we could.  As we indicated to the company before closing, with this not happening, we felt like we needed to let our HOA, others rental services and the general public know our experience with Mr. Stanton and Exit Realty.

One of their brokers/owners stepped in to call us to see what could be done and apologized repeatedly, saying he believed it was an honest mistake and that it has changed how they will do things in the future.  He said on all future transactions, they will have a disclosure form for things like assessments.  First, I am shocked that's not already common practice as I know in Tennessee everything has a disclosure.  Second, I am glad that this error may have changed how Exit Realty does business, but it was at $4700 of my expense.  We hope this helps anyone who is looking to list or buy in the future and will assist you in assuring the same thing doesn't happen to anyone else

But her greatest quality is her unwavering enthusiasm. She loves the real estate business and she loves her clients and I would highly recommend her for your next sale or purchase.

name: Wayne Riddlebaugh
text:
If I had to describe my experience with Kathy in a single sentence, it would be that she is the best realtor on the planet!  She is friendly to work with ... She is professional and ethical ... She explains everything as you go along, and she doesn't mind answering questions ... She will talk by phone when necessary, anytime day or night ... She works very hard and deligent for her clients, whether you are the buyer or seller.  After working with her to successfully buy my home, she is now, and forever will be, my friend!

Bottom line, if you need the services of a realtor, in Southwest Alabama or the Northwest Florida Panhandle, you owe it to yourself to contact Kathy!

text: Looking for an Agent that looks at the sale or purchase of your home the way you do, look no further. text: I loved working with Kathy through our relocation. She never lost patience with my high maintenance expectations. Only wish she could have been our relator in our new location.

I always feel confident in recommending Kathy to buyers in search of an honest, diligent realtor with their interests at heart.

text: Selling can be a daunting task, there are so many unforeseeable issues that can arise.  Often I attempt to go it alone, figure it out and learn how to achieve something. It’s my whole hearted recommendation that if you need a realtor than you need Amy Patterson!  Thank you Amy for being so committed to each one of us, your clients; past, present and future!

text: Amy was fantastic.  We knew it would be difficult locating a house out of state, but once we found a house she was super responsive and walked us through the process. I would highly recommend Amy to be your realtor to assist making this process easier and much more stress free.

She advocated for us throughout this process and we would definitely recommend her to anyone who’s in the market of buying or selling houses!! Thanks again for everything, Amy.

text: Amy was great to work with. text: Amy is an awesome realtor that I highly recommend. She works hard to make sure her customers are happy and is always willing to help/assist with questions throughout the home buying process.

text: In my recent experience with using Amy Patterson as our listing agent, if I had a chance to give 100 stars, I would. Without hesitation, Amy was mentioned.  Not only was Amy more than helpful every step of the way, she had a buyer lined up with a full price offer IN LESS THAN TWO DAYS!  Do not look any further.  Use Amy for any real estate need!

name: Brittany Liles
text: Amy was incredible! We were buying a house out of state which is already a difficult task plus it was in the thick of the housing market being so so busy (2021) before we came out to AL amy worked with us to find homes well within our budget, didnt try to push us on more than we could afford and took her time to get to know what we really liked so finding more homes didnt feel like such a chore or like we were doing it alone. Once we got to AL we were only in town at the time for a week and while we know Amy had other clients she really made us feel like we had her undivided attention and she jump on every opportunity to help us and answer questions ASAP. As first time homebuyers we were not educated on everything that goes into buying and Amy didnt treat us like we should know better, i truly can not explain how unbelievably helpful she was through the entire process. Then THE TEAM she chose for us was amazing between the inspector and attorneys for closing we felt so supported. Amy dosnt just come with professionalism and experience, she offers so much more as a genuine person, making everything feel easy even when it very very much was not an easy task (as a buyer) in this sellers market! Her above and beyond attention and attitude I honestly could not recommend her enough, she was suggested to us by a friend who said all the same things.

text: Excellent service! Amy was very responsive to our needs and made us feel like we were in good hands all the way through the process. I would highly recommend her!

name: Adrienne Carr
text:
Amy is a rockstar. I am from out of state and was in the market for an investment property. Amy not only sent me potential listings, but toured and evaluated those listings for me. She was totally honest and patient as we looked for a property that fit my criteria. When we found the property, she acted quickly and professionally to secure it. Since I couldn't be there, she did every walk through for me and pointed out areas that needed attention from the seller before closing. She truly went above and beyond the scope of her job to help me, even picking up and sending mail the to me and helping me transfer bills into my name.
After the closing, she found a great tenant for the property. She ran the background/credit checks and met the potential tenants for walkthroughs. She helped me pick the most solid applicant and the property was rented and tenant placed.
You won't find another realtor that will work as hard for you. She is super nice and friendly and most importantly, has your back in the transaction. I HIGHLY recommend you call Amy for all of your real estate needs. When I'm ready to purchase again, I will most certainly call Amy!!

text: Amy Patterson is an excellent Realtor and a great person. She is knowledgeable and gives her clients the time and level of service they deserve. I would recommend Amy to anyone!

text: Amy was the best !!!! Very patient and reliable. Smart too. We looked at alot of homes . Never felt pressured that’s important.

name: Matt Phillips
text: Amy did an incredible job. She helped us buy a house and  Sell a house. She is very friendly and thorough.

text: Amy was a very impressive real estate agent who worked with us very closely while we were still in Virginia and transition to Alabama she was very attentive to our needs and our wants out of our new home and saw that every detail was taken care of.

name: Linda Theriot
text: I was in search of a place to live and was trying to decide whether I should buy a house or a townhouse.  I spent most of the summer looking at both options but had difficulty in reaching a decision.  Each time I procrastinated, the house sold before I could make up my mind.  Amy warned me that this season was a sellers market and houses were selling on the first day of listing.  I finally saw a townhouse that I loved and attempted to put a contract on the property.  Amy told me that I should offer one price but I hesitated and wanted to offer a lower price.  After losing the bid on two townhouses, Amy continued to search in every area of town she thought I would like.  On this particular morning she texted me and said another townhouse had come on the market in the neighborhood I desired and I needed to act on it if I was interested.  She arranged for me to tour the property immediately.  Again I was trying to decide if this is what I should do, so she informed me of an alternative option to secure the property.  I finally decided to submit the bid and again she admonished me to rethink my offer as there were others looking at the property.  I adjusted my price according to her advice and to my surprise, my offer was accepted.  Amy walked me through every step of the process which resulted in a more than satisfactory result.  She worked tirelessly with me to make sure I understood all the terminology, options and closing attorney.  I moved in my home in October and have been very satisfied with the process and my new home.  I highly recommend Amy as she is very knowledgeable not only with the current housing market, but every detail of the loan process.  She made sure I got the best with the least amount of confusion.  I have had other realtors in the past; however, Amy was hands on day and night to assure me that I understood terminology, what was expected from me and what would be acceptable with the seller. I have recommended her to several others that I felt would benefit from her handling their own journey.   I know you will be glad you've chosen Amy to represent you in your next home purchase.  The end result will be years of satisfaction and gratitude for allowing her to guide you in a pleasant home buying experience.

name: Donald Baldwin
text: Amy sold our house in 1 day!  Did a fantastic job and i highly recommend her

name: Brian Bauer

text:

When we started looking for a lake house, we explained to Justin and his TEAM that we had a complicated 1031 Exchange to execute in a short period of time.  Justin worked with us every step of the way – from showings (multiple) to offer; from counter offers to agreement; from agreement to home inspection; from home inspection to closing – Justin ensured we had everything we needed to allow for a seamless transaction.
There is no better professional or better person to list or purchase your lake home.  Integrity is his underpinning and follow up (even after the sale) is his cornerstone.
In business, there is no higher honor than to have someone recommend you – contact Justin Dyar – I promise that you will not be disappointed.

text: I was disappointed with the lack of listening from this realty team, in regards to all of the money I had spent to update my house at Smith Lake. I repeated the thousands of dollars in repairs multiple times to multiple people on the realty team, but prospective buyers kept asking the same questions. I finally accepted an offer from someone that still didn’t know the $20,000 I had put into repairs. Once they knew I had done all of that, they made an offer. I can’t help but think I could have made more money from another buyer, had buyers known the work I put in. Very disappointing experience.

resp.text: Hello Lindsay! We are sorry that you felt there was a disconnect. We are also sorry that you had to repeat information. I was not aware you felt that way or would have intercepted. Again, we do appreciate your business and glad the lakehouse was sold quickly. Best of luck to you!

name: anita williams
text:
When my husband and I decided to sell our home, we knew that the upgrades we made would be all we would need to get a good price for our house,  We upgraded our kitchen and three of the four bathrooms in the house.  We decided to leave the Powder Room as is as well as the carpet in the living and dining rooms.

We then called three Realtors.  The first two Realtors loved the house, did a walk through and immediately gave me a briefing about their qualifications and then presented me with a quote that looked like It was a duplicate of the quote we received about 2 years ago when we tried to sell.  We weren't impressed.  We didn't feel that they put a lot of thought into our home.  Our third Realtor was Michael Rosenblum.  Just as the others, he proceeded to walk through the house.  When he returned, he handed me, not a quote, but a brochure about Rosenblum Realty.  He then proceeded to suggest to me several upgrades in the house that we should consider before putting it on the market.  Again, he did not give me a quote, but he offered to help me get the work done at a reasonable price.  We completed the upgrades and then signed with Rosenblum Realty.  Michael took pictures of the house immediately and helped us with staging services as well.  The brochure was beautifully done.  It was so nice we kept several copies to show our family and friends.  Our house sold in about 6 months at full price.  We appreciated the dedication Michael had in selling our home.  It made us feel as if our house was the only one he had to sell.  We could tell that he was a family man and that was important to us as well.  Every chance we get we recommend Michael Rosenblum Realty to anyone we know wanting to sell their home.

Staunchis and Anita Williams

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words.  It was as an absolute pleasure working with you and your husband.  And I'm always happy to help anyone you refer to me...

name: Harry Buck
text:
Kyra was a pleasure to work with from beginning to closing on our condo in Foley Alabama. The process took a year and she was attentive the entire time. Kyra asked what amenities were important in a condo. We began to correspond and narrow down what we liked and didn’t like. Kyra would narrow her search criteria based on what we discussed with her. We met with Kyra once before we moved to Foley. She explained the difference in the neighborhoods as far as proximity to shopping, schools, churches and amenities that each neighborhood had.
Kyra knows the areas well.  If you tell her what you want and are specific she knows what neighborhoods you would enjoy. She was so very helpful with contractors and decorating ideas. She is the real deal and can do it all for you and your family.
Thanks Kyra for a job well done!
Harry and Karen Buck

name: P. B.
text:
After Hurricane Sally flooded our vacation home, going through the process of repairing it and deciding to put it on the market wasn't an easy one. But I consider myself fortunate to have had Kyra as our realtor once the decision was made to put it up for sale. Why ?

1. She always answers her phone when you call, or text. Always
2. She goes above and beyond her job description. She not only listed and showed the home to potential buyer, but also worked hand in hand with my contractor.
She picked out flooring, wall colors, and even got the deal of a lifetime on all of my appliances for the home(for half of the budget I had allocated).
3. She is always polite and on top of things and is very pro-active. Not pushy, but very professional.
4. And finally, she sold the home the day it went on the market. Within a couple of hours to be exact, for the full listing price.
5. With all the stress that came with listing  flooded home I can honestly say that she made the entire process as stress free as it could have possibly been.

I cannot recommend Kyra enough. Thank you Kyra !

name: Ian Walters
text:
Mike Hamm is definitely not the “sell it and forget it” type realtor that I have encountered in the past.

He guided us through the entire process with patience, and a wealth of knowledge and advice; as first-time buyers in the USA he explained everything in detail and was always available to answer our questions.

Negotiations with the seller’s realtor went very smoothly and we were very happy with the final offer and terms of closing.

After closing, Mike kept in touch with us to make sure pre-contract repairs were progressing and everything was getting resolved to our satisfaction; even when things went wrong that a realtor couldn’t possibly have any control over (leaking fridges and dishwashers) Mike was on hand to provide advice and recommendations.

His friendly nature and calm response to things we considered potentially disastrous gave us great peace of mind throughout the entire process from first viewing, to moving in, and finally finding time to sit in my new home-office to write this testimonial.

We would strongly recommend Mike Hamm to anyone who is looking for an honest, friendly, knowledgeable realtor.

name: Frank carruba
text: I bought my current house and sold the previous one using Eddy Harris at Expert Realty.  Very good, professional work by them.  On the sale they put up a sign showing my house was coming soon.  On the sale start date I had 2 full price offers. Eddy handled everything.  What an easy transaction for me.  On the repurchase, Eddy knew the area that I wanted to buy in.  He actually found me the perfect house that had not even posted a for sale sign yet.  The house was presented as a for sale by owner.  That didn't matter to Eddy.  He still arranged a showing and  prepared the offer contract for me and did all the things a listing agent would do associated with a buyer client.  In fact he even stayed on top of things with the seller to make sure things he was contractually obligated to do were handled properly.  Great job by Eddy and his staff at Expert Realty.

Eddy told us that the house is in a great conditions cause he knows the seller personally. He deceived us and his buddy provided us with the fraudulent inspection. Now we are having to fix several issues and spend lots of money. I don't recommend Expert Realty to anyone!

name: Kelly Vacula
text:
Keller Williams should be ashamed of their selling agent Lynn Burbach.

We recently closed on a purchase of a house listed by Keller Williams and as you can see from the pictures, the condition the house was left in was totally disgusting. This house was moved out of and abandoned without any cleaning at all. Our purchasing agent contacted Ms. Burbach throughout the process prior to the final walk through and we were assured the house would be cleaned prior to closing. These pictures were taken at the final walk through and provided to Ms. Burbach and her response was that she did not see a problem. After a lengthy back and forth between agents, we were subsequently offered $50 to cover the cleaning of this house in a take it or cancel the closing statement from Ms. Burback. Multiple cleaning agencies were contacted and the same pictures that are attached here were provided to them, and all promptly declined to clean this house for a measly $50. We have spent countless hours cleaning this house on our own over the last week, to get it to an acceptable point to even start moving in. Keller Williams and Ms. Burback conduct in this situation is inexcusable.

Additionally, many items that were attached to the house at the showing were removed prior to the final walk through (Ring door bell system, digital dead bolts, TV mounts in the bedrooms). None of these items were disclosed in the listing documents as intended to be uninstalled from the house prior to closing (all were assumed to be left at the house as they were attached/installed on the house). All of these removed items left multiple large holes in and marring on the associated walls or door that were not repaired.

If you are a purchaser, beware. We highly DO NOT recommend houses listed by either Ms. Burbach or Keller Williams.

resp.text: Kelly, We are the "Ken Williams" sales team and we are not associated with Keller Williams Realty or Lynn Burbach. We are a team of 3 agents on Lake Gunterville. Could you please remove this review?

name: Joshua Small
text: We met Diana Spencer at an open house and decided to start our journey of moving into Huntsville with her. She treated us with respect and was diligent about keeping the process moving forward! She took time to drive all over the area with us since we didn't know the area well yet to establish a baseline for what we liked and didn't. Very personable and responsive to our wants/needs. Diana allowed us to make our own decisions throughout while giving us all the information we needed to make the right decision. She went out of her way on numerous occasions to meet up somewhere to exchange documents or even go to look at a house or call a contractor in the area to find out information we were curious about. I would highly recommend Diana for any of your home buying needs!

text: Marsha Buxton is the BEST!  If you want a realtor who will listen to what you want,  work really hard for you and work with you even AFTER the sale of the home, Marsha is your agent! name: Person Adam
text:
My wife and I purchased our first home in 2009 and employed Mrs. Jayne Pittman as our real estate agent. In a matter of weeks we found a house we liked in the Reserve. Jayne managed to negotiate the price 10000 dollars off the listing, and we've been pleased with our experience with Keller Williams ever since.

Recently, I discovered a roof leak, so I called a roof inspector, and he said the leak was due to improper flashing around the chimney. The final quote to repair our damaged living room ceiling and to reflash the chimney was 1400 dollars.

I contacted the home inspector we'd originally hired to catch things like this, and I requested a full refund for the $250 dollars I'd paid him, but he refused. "Contract only covers a year," he said rather tersely.

So I crafted an email to Keller Williams to offer feedback on the inspector they'd suggested and ended it with, "I am merely offering this letter as feedback so your company may suggest home inspectors who value things like work ethics and customer satisfaction."

A day later, I received a response from Robert Simons, team leader, who offered a $250 dollar reimbursement for the inspection cost.

"While you state that you recognize that Keller Williams Realty does not have any responsibility for Mr. Owens not observing the wear of your flashing, I want to offer to reimburse you for the cost of the inspection in good faith and to thank you for your trust in Keller Williams Realty and Jayne."

I was aghast. I don't know how else to put it.

Keller Williams is top notch in customer satisfaction. They run an honest business, and I'll certainly rely on them again in the future.

resp.text: We do not have a tenant or client by this name. We do accept workorders by phone, through the system, and through the office. resp.text: We are unfamiliar with this person. And she is not a tenant nor client. We apologize to anyone who feels that their workorder is taking longer than it should. If it is over a certain amount, the owner may request a number of bids on the same job which lengthens the time to completion. We wish this process was quicker as we do sympathize with the difficulties the tenant faces; however, we have to wait until an owner approves the estimate amount to proceed and then schedule the repair. If we cannot reach the tenant, that further lengthens the process. We are not in an easy position and have to balance keeping owners and tenants happy. Just know that we have often come out of our pocket to repair items for tenants on properties that do not belong to us.  We do our very best to keep both sides happy but, again, it is a difficult balance. We would love to talk with anyone who is having trouble so we can work through it.

resp.text: This tenant posted this 1-star review without us even knowing what was going on.  We attempted to reach out to no avail.  We realized that one of our girls in the office contacted her regarding her past due lease expiration and that we needed to negotiate a new rate or she would automatically go on the much higher month -to-month rate.  On 10/2/20 she put in a 30 day notice, 10/3/20 posted this Google review, and 10/5/20 posted a BBB complaint.  The BBB has now found her original 5-star review that she posted with them in August 2019 indicating how great we are.  We are going to pursue the issue.  We cannot allow angry tenants who are angry about the situation instead talking to us to post ugly things online in an attempt to damage someone.  We have text messages (because she would not answer the phone) showing proof that we attempted to find out the issue and attempt to resolve.

name: Georgia Burns
text: RENTERS BEWARE!!!! What you see is NOT what you get! If I could give her negative stars I would! She lacks professionalism, is a bully, is unethical, and a slumlord. Multiple tenants report being without working AC, stoves, and refrigerators. Some report mold in their home. In addition to being of poor morale, it has been reported by the local news that she and her staff tested positive for Covid-19 and continue to work, exposing others daily. There was a small protest outside of her office today. Feel free to search the local news and Facebook for reference. There’s an entire thread exposing the true character of this woman. I wouldn’t rent a property from her for my dog to live in. Fortunately for some, you haven’t experienced that side of her. Perhaps it’s the color of your skin or your socioeconomic status that has spared you!

resp.text:
We are unfamiliar with this person and we would like to clarify some points.  Regarding maintenance, we have a process by which all maintenance workorders are documented and dispatched in a timely manner. We then obtain bids and have to get owner approval. If something was not fixed within what the tenant deemed to be an appropriate time frame - it is generally because it is caught in the process of bid and approval and continually hampered by COVID. We are here to discuss any maintenance issues with tenants and are willing to come up with a plan while going through this process.

Regarding the issue of COVID, we had one person that had originally tested positive.  We found out same day and everyone was quarantined and tested.  No one came back until they tested negative so the accusation is false and it was not reported in the news.

This person is not and has never been a client or tenant.

name: Pamela Hewlett
text: Since they took over our apartments.things are better

name: Taylor Thomas
text:
Why are you trying to collect rent payments during a nationwide epidemic? Honestly do you realize how ridiculously insensitive that is?

You’re asking people to pay rent when they’re out of work and could jeopardize their lives and the lives of the people around them? I am absolutely appalled you can quietly justify insisting people pay because of lease agreements?

What kind of precedent do you think that creates? You are subject to eviction if you can’t pay?? Do you realize how insane that is to force people out of quarantine because you’re going into debt??

You’re the kind of person that makes other people resentful and spiteful towards landlords. You’re a toxic human being and insensitive to the core for sending out inhumane notices. I hope all your investors realize the kinds of values you have.

resp.text: We have no tenant or client by this name. This person is not aware of the facts or of what we have tried to do for our tenants during these unprecedented times.

name: Princess P
text: The lack of professionalism, communication, and sense of urgency from this company is astounding. I have contacted Cummings on several occasions in regards to repairs needed on my home to no fault of my own. There was also a professional inspection done, in which she was made aware of damages and what it would take to repair them. She’s continued to assure me that her maintenance team would take care of the repairs. It’s been well over a month later and no repairs have been attempted nor made. I would consider myself to be very understanding and patient. However, it is very unethical to allude to providing great service online and in reality that isn’t the case. All the raving reviews I assume are from the property owners not the tenants. Also, there’s no need to conveniently contact me right away, continue to take your time.

resp.text: This young lady has made posts in various names which we have responded to.  We have a weekly service going to her home (just to check on any issues). In addition there are currently contractors working on the building itself - renovating the interior and exterior. She is unhappy with what she signed on for. We have attempted to make her happy; however, we are very certain that no level of service will make this young lady happy. We are going to offer her a release from her agreement.  She is also having her friends post (whom we do not know) because she is angry.

text: Michelle Cummings is bullying my close family friend (her tenant) into moving out as a “solution” to fixing repairs in her home. This woman has been the furthest thing from professional in dealing with the matter. She refuses to deal with this in a timely manner. She is also responding combatively and simply unprofessionally.

name: Anonymous Anonymous
text: This company is attempting to create a narrative that tenants are only upset due to having to still pay rent during the pandemic. What about the tenants who pay their rent on time every month even during this crisis. What about the backed up work orders, slow response times, no completion of maintenance request before the pandemic. This company is using the pandemic to conveniently justify why work orders aren’t being completely in a timely manner but expect their tenants to still fulfill their obligations while they get a pass. This letter that was sent out during the pandemic is an example of how this company operates. It was completely inappropriate and unprofessional to advise anyone on how to spend their “stimulus check”.

name: Mike Ryan
text:
This company is very predatory. Applying (and being approved!) for a house with this company does not guarantee you a house with them. They will gladly tell other potential customers that if they race down to their office and give them money first they will give the house to them instead. Glad we were able to avoid this place before they became our landlord. I'm guessing they would be a nightmare as a land lord, too!

Want to rent a house from them? My recommendation: RUN!

Expect a defensive response from the owner to this review. It was nothing but excuses when we complained to them over the phone and in person about this situation.

Post Review Edit based on the owner's response:
1. "We explained that the home could not be held without a deposit." This is a lie that was stated after they gave away the home they approved us for
2. "She was not angry." She was. And she still is.
3. "This couple was treated with respect" We weren't.

And in case you need evidence of how predatory this business is: "Again, we give you opportunity to pay immediately"

resp.text: Mr. Ryan and his coapplicant Ms. Planer applied for a home and were approved.  We explained that the home could not be held without a deposit. Ms. Planer called that morning and the home was still available- we told her that she could pay over the phone and she did not do so. Another person who had already submitted a general application decided to put down deposit on that home. Ms. Planer would have been called but she came in immediately after that. We showed her other properties and she voluntarily put down a deposit on another home. She was not angry. Mr. Ryan was the one that expressed displeasure and we told them that we could find a substitute or return deposit. They thought on it over a weekend and came back for deposit which was returned with no issue. This couple was treated with respect and our team made every attempt to meet their needs. We are sorry that their first choice home was not available for them. Again, we give you opportunity to pay immediately.

name: Streetninja 0909
text: I bought a house from Porter.  Anna Pearce Spink was my agent.  She was amazing.   I couldn't have asked for an easier experience!  She made everything clear and concise.  She found a great lender for me.  She even went the extra mile for a seller who chose to "sell by owner".  I feel lucky to have had the experience I did with Anna and Porter Properties!   Thanks, Anna!!

name: Kevin Kurtz
text: Carole Harrison of Weichert, Realtors - Porter Properties, was the best realtor we have ever worked with when purchasing our townhome in Auburn, Alabama.  In extremely challenging and difficult times, she was willing to assist in any way, including interfacing with the lender, home inspector, appraiser, conducting the final walk-through, and attending the closing.  We trusted Carole with our remote closing and she delivered flawlessly, always responsive and willing to go the extra mile.  We highly recommend her.

resp.text: Thank you Kevin for the outstanding review! Carole is amazing, and will go to all lengths to insure her clients are happy. She is truly a valued member of our Weichert Realtors, Porter Property family.

name: Gary Hepp
text: It was a pleasure to have Carole as my realtor. She was very knowledgeable about the local real estate market and helped me set a fair price for my house and property. Hiring a professional photographer made all the difference in presenting the best aspects of my property. She was always available to answer any questions, was very personable, and was easy to work with.

resp.text: Thank you Gary for your 5 star review!  We are so pleased that your real estate experience was smooth and positive. Carole Harrison is one of the best and we are proud to have her on our team! Thank you for trusting Weichert!

name: Laura Faith
text: Carole from Weichert was extremely professional and went above and beyond to help us sell our apartment. Even though the pandemic gave us a hard time Carole still got the job done. Thanks Carole and Weichert!

name: Lynn Binnix
text:
Kate was very helpful and VERY patient with my husband and I. Always available to talk or text. Kate was always keeping and eye out for properties that she thought we might like to look at. She kept us informed on the sale of our home and everything in between. I would not hesitate to contact her again. Hopefully she will be able to find our son a home in the near future.

Thank you for everything Kate

Andy and Lynn

resp.text: Congratulations on the sale of your home! We appreciate the kind words. Thank you for taking the time to share with others about your wonderful experience with our agent, Kate Petty. We hope that your son will find the HOME he is looking for soon! Thanks again!

name: Adrienne Brendle
text: Carole Harrison is the ultimate real estate professional. She is knowledgeable about the real estate industry and the Auburn real estate market in particular.  We found Carole easy to talk with, able to answer questions for us promptly and went the extra mile to help us buy and then sell our home in Auburn.  I highly recommend her to anyone looking to purchase property in the Auburn area.

resp.text: Thank you, Adrienne, for your 5 star review! We are not surprised by your experience; Carole is the quintessential professional. Congratulations on your sale of your adorable Hearthstone condo!

name: Karen Hill
text:
Nancy Pearson was phenomenal and very detailed oriented.  she told us exactly what we needed to do to sell the house.  She was easy to work with and always available to us as we live 2000 miles away.  The house needed some renovations done and Nancy oversaw all of it for us.  We could not have sold it without her expertise and help.  Our neighbors noticed how she came by the house daily to check on things.  They told us when they sell their home they want Nancy to be their realtor.  Nancy is a true gem and asset in your company.  I would highly recommend her to anyone wishing to sell their home.

Bill and Karen Hill

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are so pleased that Nancy's work ethic speaks for itself and that you were able to sell your home from such a distance. Thank you for your business and for taking the time to leave this note!

name: Kevin Williams
text: We have bought and sold over 9 homes in our lifetime.  During our time in Auburn, we used Carole Harrison to both buy and more recently to sell our Eastlake home.  Can't recommend her highly enough.  She is the most honest person I have ever met and if you let her she will guide you in the right direction on either end of the transaction.  I will say that the place her experience and skill set proved most useful for us, was on the back end of the transactions.  She has an amazing ability to work through issues in the closing process, keep all parties on track (keep our stress level down) and bring the sale across the finish line.  IMO, that is a skill set that is very hard to find in the this industry.

name: Cody Seay
text: Chris Simmons was an excellent realtor during our home buying experience. He was extremely responsive and caring throughout the whole process. I would highly recommend Chris and Weichert Realtors.

resp.text: Excellent! Thank you, Cody, for leaving this review. Congratulations on your beautiful new home!

name: Catherine Bersani
text: I live in Colorado and being out of state we needed to do most communication via phone, email and text. I found that Weichert/Porter exceeded all expectations. Yvette Lowe kept me well-informed. I was immediately updated of transaction communication and she came to me with all appropriate questions in a timely fashion. My daughter in Alabama was my proxy and Yvette took a significant amount of time showing her properties, communicating with both of us through all transactions through to closing. I could write much more but the gist of my opinion is that I was extremely happy with the realtor services provided.

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Bersani, for such a detailed review! We know how daunting it can seem to purchase real estate site-unseen, so we take great measures to ensure you are comfortable with and fully informed about your real estate transaction. Thank you for placing your confidence in Yvette Lowe, as well as Weichert, Realtors – Porter Properties. We value your business!

name: Amanda Williamson
text: Yvette Lowe is wonderful to work with.  She is very attentive to the needs of her clients and works to bring about a flawless closing.  I highly recommend Yvette and am very thankful she was by our side as we made the move to Opelika!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a message about your positive experience with Yvette! We hope you settle in to Opelika happily. Thanks again!

name: Clue Wyatt
text: Very helpful with my questions .

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a positive review! We are thrilled that Nicholette was able to help you with your sale and purchase. Enjoy your new home!

text: Jenny Clary did an excellent job with selling our house and helping us purchase a house. I highly recommend her. She was always available and always had answers to our questions.

text: Nancy Pearson is the best!!  We had a full asking price offer for our home in less than a week of listing it.  She went above and beyond in her assistance to us throughout the entire process of closing.  Nancy and the team at Weichert Realtors - Porter Properties is amazing to work with. We appreciate your business and especially for taking the time to share your wonderful experience. Thanks again!

name: Andrew Swartzer
text: Carole Harrison did an excellent job for us in our home search.  Coming from out of town and not understanding the Auburn Real estate market, it was nice to have an agent with many years of experience in the area.  Ultimately, we decided on a new-construction property which had its own challenges - from builder delays to contract issues.  She handled each challenge professionally, courteously, and in expert fashion.  If you're looking for an agent, Carole is a great choice.

resp.text: Mr. Swartzer, we are so glad that you had such a wonderful real estate experience with Carole Harrison! Thank you for taking the time to leave this informative review. Our team of experienced agents is committed to helping clients like you who relocate to the Auburn/Opelika area. On behalf of Weichert, Realtors – Porter Properties, welcome to The Loveliest Village on the Plains! We wish you all the best in your NEW home!

name: Paige Kennedy
text: Al Earnest was the perfect match for me. My experience with the whole process was done with excellence.

resp.text: Thank you, Paige, for your kind review. Congratulations on your home purchase! We are so pleased that your real estate experience was smooth and positive. Thank you for trusting Weichert!

name: Anna Laughlin
text: I struggle to put in to words the phenomenal job Yvette Lowe did for me while purchasing my home. Don't let that cool under fire, Southern beauty fool you in to thinking she does not know her stuff. That girl had my back at every turn. She protected me, the buyer, in every way. She asked questions - many questions, put feet to the fire, demanded and got results, repairs and receipts. She noticed many things, big and small that I overlooked. She is punctual, hard working, loyal, friendly, knowledgeable and has the tenacity of a tiger on the prowl. She will work from sun up to way after sun down to make sure your needs and inquiries are met. Truly a Super Woman! I was comfortable with her from the moment I met her. She is easy to converse with, an intent listener and will not hold back sharing concerns that might effect your successful outcome as a buyer or seller. She offers sound, honest and caring advice. She takes her commitment to her clients seriously. Weichert is so lucky to have her on staff, she is now my BFL....Broker For Life! I'm so grateful she found for me my little, country, forever home where the grand kids can come and play and get filthy dirty and we can have fun family, pool, birthday, kickball, BBQ, tailgate, play in the rain parties!! #thankfulforyvette #bestbrokerinbama

resp.text: Now that is a stellar review! Thank you, Anna, for your detailed and highly entertaining remarks about your positive experience with Yvette Lowe! We are so proud to have her on our team. We wish you a lifetime of happy memories at your new home. And we're always up for a game of kickball if you're looking for players! ;)

name: John Troxel
text:
Carole Harrison is a supremely conscientious and responsive agent. We had a very limited window of time to shop for a home. She cleared her schedule and drove us everywhere to make it on time for many consecutive appointments that fit our availability. She also arranged repeat and new visits on very short notice. Her regional experience and advocacy with the contract offer greatly assisted our successfully closing the deal. She also arranged the buyer's home inspection, follow up contract requests and walk through as well as the settlement location and date.
We wholeheartedly recommend her as your next agent.

name: Travis Engram
text: Our agent, Sherry Adcock, was a joy to work with. She helped us find and purchase our home in Auburn on a very short timetable. Her responsiveness and research, even later in the evening, was key to us avoiding transitional housing. Sherry is easy to work with and super friendly. She is a great person who happens to sell real estate. I would recommend her to anyone looking for an agent in the Auburn area.

resp.text: Mr. Engram! On behalf of Sherry and our company we truly appreciate the nice review. We always strive to provide the best customer service and love to hear feedback good or bad from our customers/clients. Thanks again and please let us know if we can ever help you again with your real estate needs.

name: Caroline Donnelly
text: We had a wonderful experience from start to finish with Weichert Realty. Carole Harrison , our realtor, helped us price and prepare our home . We sold to the first person that looked at it on the first day it was listed !!! Can't do better than that....except we did...it sold for more than asking price. Would definitely recommend Weichert Realty and Carole Harrison if you want a thoroughly professional team.

resp.text: Congratulations on selling your beautiful home so quickly, Ms. Donnelly! It sure is great when it happens--and with your location and stunning home, it is no surprise that it happened as it did! Thank you for taking the time to leave Weichert, Realtors - Porter Properties and Carole Harrison a review! We greatly appreciate it!

name: Michael Massey
text: Jeff Clary is hands-down the best agent! I can't imagine going through purchasing a home with any other Realtor.

resp.text: Thank you, Mr. Massey, for leaving a review. We are proud to have Jeff Clary on our team. It brings us such satisfaction to provide 5-star quality of service to our clients. We greatly appreciate you taking the time to leave a message endorsing one of our agents.

Yvette was awesome! She loves her work, and she genuinely loves people!!

name: Carol Muise
text: Carole Harrison is a true professional! She is competent and very knowledgeable about real estate. Very friendly and was happy to help us on our way to purchase our new home in Opelika.

resp.text: Thank you, Mrs. Muise! We are so pleased to hear you had a great experience! Thank you for taking the time to leave this review. We wish you countless blessings in your new home! Welcome to Opelika!

name: Patrick Deery
text: Carole Harrison evidenced a concern for our particular needs that resulted in both a quick and satisfactory sale of our property.  In fact, our expectations for the property’s sale were far exceeded in terms of both the speed of the transaction and the price obtained.

name: Janita Ball
text: Where to start??!! Nicholette Boyer was our Superhero in our search for a first home. My husband and I were both clueless as to how this process worked and we took her all over county lines looking at houses, but she never complained. She showed up with a smile. Nicholette consistently sent us potential listings and if we wanted to view a home she would have the viewings set up ASAP. She is a sweetheart who is so personable. I don't take to people easily, but I LOVE Nicholette. She kept everyone in our process in check and made sure that they were working in our best interest. The stress of this process is insurmountable and (needless to say) my husband and I cracked a few times. She hung in there with us and didn't judge us at all (well if she did we didn't know). She is very professional and such a sweet lady. I'm a tough critic but Nicholette definitely delivered. She went out of her way to acknowledge our emotions, address our concerns, and help lower our stress levels. WE found our little slice of the American Dream with Nicholette's help and close today! If you want a hard-working realtor who will go to bat for you and keep you informed throughout the process I HIGHLY recommend Nicholette. You won’t regret using her!

resp.text: Thank you for your detailed, candid, 5-star review! Congratulations on your Closing Day! We wish you countless beautiful memories in your first home.

name: Chris Anthony
text: My daughter attended Auburn University and graduated last spring.  We had purchased a condo in Donahue Crossing, and following her graduation it was time to sell.  Living out of state, I knew it would be a challenge to do all that needed to be done to make that happen.  I contacted Weichert Realtors, (after not getting calls returned from 2 other Auburn realtors) and was referred to Sherry Adcock.  She met me at the condo, educated me on the Auburn market and then helped me determine what I needed to do to get the best price and sell it quickly.  She assisted me with every detail, and coordinated contractors access to the property.  Her recommendations were spot on, every time.  The sale closed today, just over 6 weeks after our first conversation.  You can't go wrong with Sherry and the folks at Weichert Realtors Porter Properties!!!

name: Kelsi Fermin
text: Sherry Adcock did an excellent job in selling our home. She had it listed and sold within two days!

name: Mark Smith
text: Everything ran smoothly, buying my new house and selling our old house, with Viki Yaron.  VERY professional agent!  Definitely recommend Viki and Weichert Realtors to those looking to buy or sell.

name: Benjamin Coker
text: Adrien Helms did a great job in assisting me in buying a home. Thank you for all the help!!

name: A P
text: Horrible experience with realtor Viki Yaron.  She was insulting and rude in her counter offers to me.  Business is business keep your feelings and opinions to yourself add libing about the seriousness of the buyer or what the buyer can or cannot afford, in your opinion, are just that, your opinion.  Bullying tactics do get  people to buy and I will never recommend this realtor to anyone!  One bad apple can spoil a bunch and am reluctant to view any other properties listed through this realty company, but I WILL NOT be viewing any properties she has listed!!

resp.text:
Ms. Pare,
As Broker of our company I take great pride in promoting professionalism by all of our Realtors.

I apologize for the fact you feel you were not treated properly in a recent real estate negotiation. Seeing as you were not a direct client of our office but working through another Realtor in purchasing one of our listings I think some things were lost in translation and probably could have been handled more tactfully.

I have spoken with Viki Yaron and she realizes some of the negotiation could have been better handled speaking directly with your Realtor in order to explain her client’s counteroffer. Please feel free to call me anytime at our office if you like to discuss further.

Stacey Sanders, Broker

name: PAPA T
text: Rachel Depriest and Cathy Fincher are the type of professional people with whom it is a pleasure to work.  'Nuf said !

name: Will Mooty
text: Jenny Clary had to go above and beyond on this sale. Thanks Jenny!

resp.text: We are proud to have Jenny on our team. Thank you for recognizing the exceptional service she provides!

name: Hollie Turner
text: If you're looking for a realtor that has YOUR best interest in mind this is your guy! He's not out for a quick buck. He takes time and effort to make sure his clients are getting what's best for them. We had our home listed with a different agent with no luck. She had actually convinced me that our home couldn't sell for what she listed it for. When we switched to Chayah he gave me insight to a few small things we could update to improve the sale of our house and got the most profit possible for us. Great guy, cares about his clients, very knowledgeable and on top of things.

name: Number One
text: Worked very hard to insure that communication was always relayed. Got our house sold for top dollar. Very good realtor

name: Ozzy Litchford
text: Very helpful throughout the whole process. We always felt like we were top priority. Would recommend him to anyone!

name: Lisa McClelland
text: Chayah was a pleasure to work with. He really worked hard for us to buy our dream house. He was always available to ask questions and he was very hands on during the completion of the renovations of the house. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for a real estate agent.

name: Paul Zimmerman
text: Takes care of clients like family. Chayah doesnt say "I'll check with so and so" or "I'll see what <somebody else> says" - he gets personally involved all the way to the bottom of the issue and reports back to the client ASAP. Knows the real estate business and really cares about his clients. Experience has shown me the two most important qualities needed in anyone who is assisting me in a significant life event (and buying and/or selling a home certainly qualifies) are Competence and Compassion. Chayah has both. Will respond to queries 7 days a week (if the issue is important to the client it's important to him.) We sold our former home and bought a home with Chayah as our buyer's agent. We couldn't have accomplished this without his professional help.

name: tosha knight
text:
I have only the highest praise and recommendation for Chayah Hodge.  In the purchase of my home, I never felt rushed or pushed to go in any direction on any of the homes we viewed.  Chayah listened to my thoughts and opinions and ensured any home I looked at always met the mark.  Chayah made me feel as though his schedule was completely open for me, accommodating my hectic lifestyle and awkward hours.

Chayah provided valuable input during my search for my home which enabled me to make the best financial decisions.  All responses to my questions and concerns were answered in a timely manner.  His patience with me and my lack of understanding was beyond that of realtor, but more resembling a friend.

I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Chayah Hodge to any person who is looking to buy or sell a home, as well as seek his service in any of my future real estate transactions.
Thank you Chayah for all that you do and helping me find my forever home for my son and I!!

name: Summer Litchford
text: One of the best people and realtor you’ll find. 10/10 recommend!

name: Jim Mcclelland
text: I plan on using Chayah for any future local real estate needs.  He was very knowledgeable of the areas we were looking at, responsive to our questions, and (with our permission) worked with the seller agent and mortgage company to help the whole process run smoothly to completion.

name: Tina Walker
text: Chayah is very professional I would recommend him to anybody that needs a realtor.

name: Candida Walker
text: Chayah is absolutely invaluable. My husband I looked for a home for over a year and not only did Chayah stick by us, he encouraged us when WE were the ones ready to give up. text: This is the Realtor you want to use...Mr. Hodge is professional and will help you overcome obstacles until you find the perfect home.  He did an amazing job for our family.. text: Hands down best experience ever! He explained everything to me and made the whole experience so easy!! Would not use anyone other than him!!!!

text:
Called back but will not pro rant rent to move in. Say's owner of wagon wheel, wouldn't allow them to rent in middle of month pro ranted with full deposit. I said, the owner would rather not get a renter in asap and make some on the end of month? Rather loose a good paying cash renter?

name: Jewel Davis
text: Makes you pay $30 per adult for application fees.  Will not let you view the property before doing an application, only had 2 properties available.  Not clear about pet policy before hand.  Rude and unprofessional, will not work with you.

resp.text:
I am very sorry you feel that you were treated rudely. Please give me a call. I would love to hear more about your experience. As far as only have two properties, our rentals get leased extremely quickly and there is high demand. We require that you fill out an application prior to showing so that we know if the applicant will qualify. The owners of the properties that we manage require a minimum credit score of 550. If it is below that, we have wasted your time.
Glenn Cooper

name: Eric Allen
text:
As an out of town owner and estate executor selling a home 3 hours away could not have been made any easier thanks to Teresa Ellard.  Teresa did a wonderful job helping me sell our mother's estate home and is a tremendous person with a wealth of knowledge, experience, and deep base of home buyers available.  She went way beyond being our listing agent by providing assistance in many different ways to help us prepare the home for sale, providing access to the property by estate sale people, home inspectors, estate attorney's, etc.  I can't say enough about how Teresa was willing to help in ways far beyond her duties with listing and selling the property.

Teresa is one of those people that is unpretentious, service minded, and willing to go the extra mile to help her clients.  The whole experience was like working with a loving family member.  You will not go wrong working with Teresa for any of your real estate needs. AAA++

name: jay johnson
text: I have dealt with Tereaa on two purchases and one sale. She was great each time. She was always available when I wanted to look at properties and she always gave me all the information and advise needed. I highly recommended her and I will use her for all of real estate needs in the area.

name: melissa hagler
text: Teresa is very knowledgeable Realtor, She’s both  Professional and Personable. She understood my wants and needs as a client , She was always available for questions with a quick response. She did an Amazing job in finding me a Home, I highly recommended her.

name: Patricia Wood
text: This was our second time using Teresa Ellard and she is the best! She helped us sell and buy our home this go around and even though we ran into multiple obstacles she got us through it! We will forever be thankful for her help! If anybody needs a great realtor she is your go to!

name: Dana Greene-Davis
text: We listed our home with Beverly and Prime Properties Realty. Our house had a contract on it within 60 days and it closed within 90 days from the time we listed it for sale! If your looking to sell you home, LOOK NO FURTHER! Beverly and Jason are very professional, helpful, willing and eager to help. name: Matthew Ingle
text: Some say, "never do business with friends." Well, I imagine they do not have friends like Jeff and Chelsea Musser. Our interest in selling our home was high and we took a chance with Southern State Realty Partners. I had so many questions throughout the process and each one was answered with detailed information. Our home had a contract within the first two days of being listed and was not just a result of a 'hot' market, but of the work done by Jeff and Chelsea. My wife and I decided not to build a home as originally planned after the sell of our home. This could have been a stress induced nightmare, but Jeff took us to view a couple of homes and found one we really thought was best for our family. The offer was written up that night and accepted. We moved in to our new home in less than a month! Selling and moving is often hard on the mind and body, but I felt more at ease and joyful because I knew who was working for me. Thank you Jeff and Chelsea for all you have done. Southern State Realty Partners are a great company and great people.

As a first-time homeowner/seller this was very much appreciated. We ended up selling the home quickly, with only a few days of open houses. I highly recommend working with Chelsea if you are looking to buy or sell a house. You will not be disappointed.

name: Trish Davis
text:
I started looking for my son his first home from three hours away from Birmingham/Hoover, Alabama. I found Chelsea Musser online.
What a blessing Chelsea Musser was to us in this home search. She met with my son, went over the process of buying a home, getting pre-approved, what her job was in the process plus, she found out what his expectations were, what he wanted in his first home purchase. Chelsea was amazing throughout this process. Chelsea answered every email, every phone call, every question.
I can't give her enough praise. Chelsea made the whole process great and painless. I highly recommend Chelsea Musser.

resp.text: Thank you Trish! It was a pleasure helping y'all. My team and I appreciate the kind words :)

name: Sarah Hegyi
text: Jeremy and his team helped us with our relocation to the Birmingham area, and we couldn’t have asked for a better agent! He was extremely responsive, patient, a wealth of knowledge about the area. He had references for everything we needed with the move: cleaning services, insurance, bank contacts, etc. He even saved us thousands on our home through his negotiations with the seller’s agent. If we ever need to relocate in the area, we will definitely be using Jeremy again! Thanks so much for a great buying experience!

resp.text: Awesome to help your family in getting into Birmingham, Sarah. Hope you enjoy the new home and what Birmingham has to offer.

name: Cara Nwodu
text: Chelsea was an amazing realtor. From the very beginning she listened and took everything we asked for and made it a reality. She was there at every turn cheering us on. She responded to every call, text or email asap no matter when, and always with such a positive attitude. Her team really made us feel like family and wanted nothing more than to see us in our dream home and did whatever they could to help us achieve it! She fought for us when we needed it and supported us in our decisions. She changed the way we view the real estate industry. We could not have asked for a better person to guide our journey!  Cannot thank them enough. Definitely recommend.

resp.text: Cara, Thank you for your great review. It was a pleasure working with you!

name: Quanah
text: After a lot of patience with us, once we finally wanted to make an offer, they made the process easy. For first-time buyers, that was important!

name: Adam Dennis
text:
Chelsea and her team promised and they delivered!  From staging and reorganizing, to multiple open houses in a 3 week period, to  assisting me in selling some of my furniture- she made it happen!  A contract in 21 days and a quick move-out date I wanted - less than 3 weeks after contract!!!

If you want your home shown, treated with respect, and sold - Chelsea Musser is the one to call!!!

name: Hanna Jones
text: Jeff and Chelsea Musser are the best real estate team in Alabama, hands down.  Our entire experience with them was nothing short of exceptional.  They recently sold our Tuscaloosa home and made the process a true pleasure with their remarkable professionalism, knowledge, and hard work.  We moved out of state from Alabama, so we were not nearby and Jeff and Chelsea were truly our hands and feet throughout the preparation of our home for sale, listing, contract, and sale stages of the process.  As a military family, we especially appreciated their attention to detail, integrity, and understanding of our unique situation.  We are incredibly thankful to them and would wholeheartedly recommend them to anyone who needs to buy or sell a home.  Our only wish is that they were also in our new area so we could use them again!  Jeff and Chelsea are an extraordinary team who you can truly trust to guide you through every step of the process.  They were true advocates for us and we will always be deeply grateful to them for all of their help to us.  Thank you, Jeff and Chelsea Musser!!!

resp.text: Hanna- Our main focus is to make sure the process can go as smoothly as possible, especially for our military families. Thanks for the kind words.

name: Angel Thuresson
text: Chelsea was amazing in helping us find just the right home. She was patient, professional, and a pleasure to work with.

name: Jennifer Davis
text: We worked with Jeremy Galloway over the past few months to purchase our first home and could not be happier! The entire process was smooth and communication was great!

resp.text: Jennifer! We love helping our first time home buyers and getting life long fans!

name: Jeremy Galloway
text: Great team over there that keeps you informed on what's going on with the real estate market.

text: Lauren was so friendly and down to earth! She made sure my hair looked exactly how I wanted it! She made accommodations for my son when I couldn’t find a babysitter and was so sweet to him! She even took the time to message me a few days later to make sure it was still looking good.(which it was) I HIGHLY recommend her! She was quick, professional, accurate, and personable! I loved the whole experience and will definitely be back to see her!!!!

She is so talented with color. And she's gentle, which is great because I'm really tender headed. I don't find her prices to be too much because you absolutely get what you pay for!

text: TL is a great hair salon. The atmosphere is very nice and relaxing. The staff are very nice and friendly. They will work in walk-ins very quickly. The location is excellent. I've always gotten great cuts and color. I love TL Signature Salon and recommend it highly.

text: TL Signature Salon is the best in town!! My hair has never looked so good. The staff is always very friendly. They are up on all the latest styles and trends. TL Salon is located in Midtown so it is very convenient. I will never go anywhere else. LOVE THIS PLACE!!!

name: Monica Showers
text: Deb Long is absolutely the best realtor I have ever worked with. She is on top of things from the very beginning, communicates consistently and goes above and beyond to make sure your transaction goes smoothly. We ended up in a situation where we would potentially be without a place to stay for the night between our house closing in FL and our house closing in AL (for a family of 4 with 2 large dogs and a cat it's not so easy to find a place to stay with the zoo in tow) and Deb and her team worked together and super fast to make sure we could close on our new home on our drive up from FL and she met us late at night to give us the key so we could go straight to our new home. She truly cares about the people she works with and it shows. If you are buying or selling a house I highly recommend Deb!

name: alicia perkins
text: Deb was absolutely great to work with from start to finish of the home-buying process! I’m a very picky person and she had the patience to help me find a great house that suited my needs. I love that she took the time to meet with me one-on-one to really get an idea of what I was looking for. I will absolutely use Deb again and recommend her to anyone looking to buy or sell a house.

name: Shella Sylla
text: If you are looking for an outstanding realtor to assist you with your buying or selling needs, look no further than Deb Long.  She stands out among realtors because she takes a comprehensive "people first" approach, and goes above and beyond to make sure she not only meets but exceeds your expectations.  She's a hard working professional that gets the job done.  And most importantly, she's an amazing friend.  If you're in the market please consider Deb as a resource.

name: oliver brown (ollie)
text: Awesome, very knowledge and helpful.

name: Caleb Martin
text: We had such a great experience with Kelly! She worked with us through the process of selling our home with such grace and wisdom. Her knowledge in the real estate world is by far the best we've encountered! Even with all the obstacles we faced from the other side of the deal, Kelly proved perseverance by patiently but actively working with both parties to get the job done. We are so grateful to her and highly recommend anyone looking for a realtor to look no further than Kelly Williams!

name: April Parker
text:
Kelly is a blessing!! She is one of the nicest, most friendly, caring, loving honest  people you will ever meet!! She has helped us on multiple occasions. She truly cares for her clients and devotes all her time and energy to her them. Honestly, you never feel like a client, you feel like family going through the home buying/ selling process together.
My first encounter with Kelly was approximately 8 years ago. We were in the process of moving, and we needed a place to rent. I got in contact with Kelly, and she happened to know of a gentleman who was getting ready to rent out his place. I told her, that I would use her for a realtor when we started looking into buying a home. Months later, my husband and I became pregnant and we were ready to buy our first home, so of course, we contacted Kelly. She is so knowledgeable and easy to work with. She helped us in anyway possible. We stayed in close contact through the whole process. She made our first home buying experience less stressful and guided us along the process every step of the way. 6 years after that, we we decided to move back home, close to family. Without any question, we called Kelly again. She came in and did a walk through to get us ready to sale our home. The process was so quick and easy and she guided us though the process and everything ran smoothly. Selling our home was a very emotional, sad time for us. We brought our babies home to that house, so it was very hard, but Kelly was very positive and encouraging during it all. When looking for our knew home, we contacted each other and she was checking in on us to see how it was going. I just mentioned how I wasn't as crazy about our new realtor. Kelly offered to travel over an hour away, to a different county, to come and help us find a home. Now that dedication and shows what a true, honest, caring realtor is all about.  Kelly was a true blessing during our multiple encounters from buying to selling our home.

name: Lara Lenard
text: Kelly Williams is an excellent realtor! I would recommend her expertise and assistance to anyone looking to buy or sell a home! We have had great experiences with her helping us buy two homes. Kelly helps you meet your specific needs and goals, and she helps with every step along the way in the process. We highly recommend her!

text: Jill and Greg went above and beyond during the process of searching, viewing, and buying a home. name: Margaret Tucker
text: We recently had the privilege of having Jill and Greg help us locate "that perfect house". They were  patient, kind, knowledgeable and communicated with us every step of the way.  They always showed integrity and were never pushy.  Acting in our best interest they even pointed out things that would need to be done.  I highly recommend these two amazing people if you are ever in need of a real estate agent.

text: Jill and Greg are the best realtors. They both have worked hard and helped my friends to find their dream home. Jill and Greg are sweet, honest, kind, and friendly.  We enjoyed working with them. I very highly recommend them.

name: Charlene Berns
text: Jill and Greg helped us sell 2 houses in a very short time period. They are professional, compassionate, responsive, and easy to work with. My family is thankful for all the hard work Jill and Greg did to help us sell our houses. They are a great team, and I highly recommend them to anyone looking to buy or sell property. I look  forward to working with them again!

name: Chad Harris
text: We listed our Home with Jill and Greg after giving it a go as a FSBO. In less than 2 weeks we had several showings and a contract that closed at our target price (above where we had priced as a FSBO). Jill knows her stuff, and Greg’s photos were phenomenal. I highly recommend this team.

name: Lorrie Sawyer
text: Jill and Greg Williams go above and beyond what most realtors do! We have moved a few times, and they are the ones we always call! Their knowledge and professionalism are top notch, but their sweet personalities will leave you feeling like old friends. We cannot say enough about these realtors!

name: Robert Cobb
text: We are so thankful for the help of Jill and Greg Williams for helping us not once but twice with our housing needs. We needed a home quickly because of a job change and they were very prompt on getting us a list of houses to look at that meet our needs. They worked with the seller to get us a great deal and even had the seller install a $6,000 dry vac system for the basement! Two years later we had a financial change and needed do make some housing changes quickly. I got back in touch with Jill and Greg because they did such a great job helping us out with our last home. They not only helped us sale our current home at a profit but helped us find a replacement home for an even better deal! We don’t know where we would be today without their help! Thank you so much Jill and Greg!

name: Patricia Osborne
text: We enjoyed working with Jill and Greg on the recent sale and purchase of our home.  They were very knowledgeable and provided realistic insight during the transaction.  I would highly recommend Jill and Greg Williams.

text: Jill Williams has never let me down. Jill is an honest, kind and ethical person but above all she is competent and produces results!

text: I have never worked with a realtor so rude and unprofessional as Julie Kochie. She wasn't even my realtor, she was the sellers realtor and the entire time, she rudely spoke to my realtor. This is NOT the profession you need to continue in if you feel that you can act the way that you do. You rudely informed my realtor that you did not have time to deal with things concerning the house you were selling and we were buying after the inspections. I do not condone this behavior and it reflects badly on the company that chose to hire you. I will never refer anyone to this company when you have individuals like this working who could careless for anyone except their own clients. There is a way to carry yourself when you work in this profession and I surely wish others could see exactly what I am discussing. So if you are choosing to go with this company, do not choose her. Go elsewhere. If I could give it no stars, I wouldn't hesitate due to how poorly we were all treated.

name: leslie huber
text: Highly suggest finding someone else to do business with. MY MISTAKE was focusing on square footage and layout, I didn't look at lack of cleanliness (I did note the carpet appeared to be dated). They apparently aired out the house before walk-through, at my return (it had been closed up a few days) cigarette smoke permeated the air. Ironically, they had ME pay a cleaning deposit.

resp.text: This was the result of a miscommunication between the cleaning crew and new owners and has been rectified.

name: FLhogs n dogs
text:
False advertising on listings.  Unethical.  Posting houses active that are under contract, etc.  Entire matter filed with Alabama Association of Realtors.

Standard of Practice 12-8
The obligation to present a true picture in representations to the public includes information presented, provided, or displayed on REALTORS®’ websites. REALTORS® shall use reasonable efforts to ensure that information on their websites is current. When it becomes apparent that information on a REALTOR®’s website is no longer current or accurate, REALTORS® shall promptly take corrective action. (Adopted 1/07)

resp.text: ValleyMLS, of which this company is a member, requires that all listings that go under contact reflect that status change within 24 hours of ratification of such contract. This company adheres to the policy of the ValleyMLS.

name: Kyrie Laré
text: I did not choose to work with anyone from this inconsistent office but had no choice after one of their realtors bought the property I live in from rocket city property management. My rent was always due by the 6th well they changed that and did not tell me then tried to charge me 50$ extra for Jan Feb and March claiming I was late but they just took too long to deposit my checks. NOT AT ANY POINT IN TIME WAS I CONTACTED AND MADE AWARE OF ANY LATE CHARGES. I HAD TO FIND THE INFORMATION ON MY ONLINE PORTAL MYSELF 3 months later and I never got a formal letter stating that I owe anything. If you owe a business, arent they supposed to send you a letter or written notice? They are so unprofessional because not only did I get ZERO letters, in the lease it stated I was to pay 45$ for late fee not 50$ so someone is not able to ensure things are consistent in this office anymore. I would not recommend dealing with this office whatsoever. They raised my rent and took three weeks to stop a huge rain water leak I had coming through my ceiling, and let me go without a working fridge for nearly a week while leaving two fridges in the tiny apartment for two weeks for storage not able to use either one. It has just been a ridiculous experience I am hoping there is a still a decent place to rent from in this area but so far this place has done me wrong totally I got two babies under 2.  Can’t afford unnecessary extra charges, rent going up, and not having a fridge. Just ridiculous and sad. I cannot wait to move.

resp.text: Kyrie,  we are so sorry this has been your experience and we would like to be able to look into your complaint.  We don't have anyone by your name registered as a tenant in our Property Management Division.  Would you please contact us at missioncontrol@weichert.space and give us your address so that we may investigate this further for you?

name: Britt Searcy
text:
I just wanted to take a minute to tell you how much we appreciate Michelle Brewer.  We started the process of moving from Pensacola, FL to Huntsville, AL about 9 months ago.  It has been a long, tedious process, but Michelle helped us tremendously every step of the way.  I think she took us to look at about 50 houses!  We closed June 5th on a new construction home and we are now living in our new home.  Michelle has become not only our "go to" realtor for life, she has become a great friend.  Thank you so much Michelle, and thank you Weirchert Realtors.
Sincerely,
W. B. and Cara Searcy
102 Somer Oaks Dr, Huntsville, AL  35811

resp.text: Thank you so much! We agree that Michelle is just wonderful!
